titleStmt.title: A most godly and vvorthy treatis of holy signes sacrifices, and sacraments instituted of God, euen since the beginning of the world. Very necessary for Christian understanding. ; Seene and allowed by authority..
titleStmt.author: Worseley, Edw.

notesStmt.note: Signed on t.p. in ms.: Edw. worseley.
Imperfect: tightly bound, print faded, lacking A₃, M₈, Bb₁, Cc₁. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
